name: front-end-test-bigcommerce
description: This test is designed to evaluate front end technical skills in HTML, CSS and Javascript in a holistic manner.  That is, the ability to create a solution from requirements in a manner that is clean and maintainable.  To that end, code structure and modularity are important, while things like pixel perfection with an associate mockup is less relevant.
author: Vy Cu <vy.hoang.cu@gmail.com> (veeweeherman.github.io)
